page.title: 05FARMING 1 -SOUTH OF BARRHEAD
page.content: {FARMING,}the main activity in the area is the main source of livelihood for most of the population. Most farms have been family owned and managed over several generations and employ few people from outwith the family. The types of farm vary and include { {DAIRY, BEEF}and{BEEF/SHEEP.}Recent years have seen a tendency to move from dairy farming towards a mixture of beef and sheep products. Typically, enough is grown to feed stock all year, only minerals and vitamins are bought in. { { CROPS...... GRASS}(summer feed),{HAY (baled and stored for winter feed), {SILAGE}(grass cut green, covered with polythene, stored for winter feed), {TURNIPS}(winter feed),{BARLEY (harvested for winter feed). Typical land use:- Perm. grass 56% , Temp. grass 31% ,Other crops 13% .
